content.prompt: In the work shown, one reason that Ai Weiwei included over a million handmade sunflower seeds spread across a large area was to

choices.label: evoke a sense of environmental waste and destruction on a large scale
symbolize the mass migration of Chinese people from rural to urban areas
allude to the volume of Chinese goods in contemporary global markets
suggest unequal distribution of agricultural resources in the global economy

topic.text: 10.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
